alert.note: Alert for San Joaquin; Stanislaus (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 11 at 12:42PM PST until March 11 at 1:45PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sacramento has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern San Joaquin County in central California... Northern Stanislaus County in central California... * Until 145 PM PST. * At 1242 PM PST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Country Club, or near Stockton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Stockton, Waterloo, Farmington, Country Club, Taft Mosswood, Garden Acres, Kennedy, August, Linden, Morada, Lincoln Village and Lockeford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows. Funnel clouds are possible.
